name: SYLVIE (SaikiSoft)
description:
"AZMUZELRULEZ.png"

WELCOME TO THE SYLVIE GAME.

You play a girl named Luna, who has been taken to a world called WONDERLAND. This world is controlled by a girl named Sylvie, who WANTS to somehow help you get out of this world, suspicious huh?

THIS GAME IS NOT FINISHED.

The second chapter "THE REAL ENDING" is not finished, I haven't even started!!

CONTROLS

Arrows: Movement

Z: Interaction and Skip text

X: Speeds up the text.

FINAL WORDS

THIS SHIT GAME IS NOT COMPLETE, I INTEND TO COMPLETE CHAPTER 2 AFTER TOMORROW... AND THE REST YOU WILL SEE.

VOTE THIS GAME SO I CAN CONTINUE IT.

there are 2 endings...
